name: Digimon Adventure 02: Tag Tamers
description:
Digimon Adventure 02: Tag Tamers (デジモンアドベンチャー02 タッグテイマーズ) is a RPG video game published by Bandai released on 2000 for the WonderSwan.
This time, "Digimon Adventure 02 Tag Tamers" is a story about why Ken-kun, who is active in the anime, has ventured down the wrong path. In addition to the conventional evolution, it also supports "armor evolution" and "jogres evolution", and with the addition of new Digimon, a total of more than 220 bodies will appear.
